header.heading: Client
header.subtitle: Real results from real people. Health, strength, and confidence — that's what we're building together.

items.name: Claire D.
items.story: Claire came to me having never set foot in a gym. Within 16 weeks, she completed her first parkrun in under 30 minutes — and hasn't looked back since. "Dean showed me that fitness isn't about punishment — it's about progress. I actually enjoy it now."

items.name: Tom W.
items.story: Tom had struggled with chronic lower back pain for years. After 12 weeks of targeted functional training with me, he's not only pain-free but deadlifting more than he ever thought possible. "I wish I'd started sooner. Dean understood exactly what I needed."

items.name: Rachel M.
items.story: Rachel lost 2 stone over 6 months — but more importantly, she gained confidence, energy, and a genuine love for training. "It's not a diet and it's not a punishment. Dean made it sustainable and I've never felt better."

items.name: James K.
items.story: As a desk worker, James was stiff, tired, and out of shape. After 6 months of online coaching with me, he's completed a half-marathon and says he feels 10 years younger. "The online programming through Hevy was perfect for my schedule."

items.name: Linda & Steve H.
items.story: This couple started training with me as a way to stay active in their 50s. "We train with Dean twice a week and it's the highlight of our routine. We're fitter than we were in our 30s — and we do it together."

items.name: Dan B.
items.story: Dan joined the Bingham Sunday Running Club as a complete novice. Six months later, he ran his first 10K. "The running club got me started, and personal training with Dean kept me going. Best decision I've made."

cta.heading: Your Transformation Starts Here
cta.body: Every journey begins with a single step. Get in touch and let's get started.
